languages.text: "Неподчинение обличенным властью есть грех. Но и отнимать у нищего последнее — не великое благо. Прости им дерзость, {name}! Пусть владеют тем, что нажили".

traits.locale_text: "Неподчинение обличенным властью есть грех. Но и отнимать у нищего последнее — не великое благо. Прости им дерзость, {name}! Пусть владеют тем, что нажили".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Disobeying those in power is apostasy. But depriving a poor person of the little they have is no good deed either. Forgive their insolence, {name}! Let them keep what they have managed to scrape together."
languages.original_text: "Неподчинение обличенным властью есть грех. Но и отнимать у нищего последнее — не великое благо. Прости им дерзость, {name}! Пусть владеют тем, что нажили".

traits.locale_text: "Disobeying those in power is a sin. But depriving a poor person of the little they have is no good deed either. Forgive their insolence, {name}! Let them keep what they have managed to scrape together."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Disobeying those in power is a sin. But depriving a poor person of the little they have is no good deed either. Forgive their insolence, {name}! Let them keep what they have managed to scrape together."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Disobeying those in power is a sin. But depriving a poor person of the little they have is no good deed either. Forgive their insolence, {name}! Let them keep what they have managed to scrape together."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Disobeying those in power is apostasy. But depriving a poor person of the little they have is no good deed either. Forgive their insolence, {name}! Let them keep what they have managed to scrape together."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “违逆掌权者确实是罪过，但剥夺穷人所剩无几的财产也不是什么善行。请原谅他们的无礼吧，{name}！让他们留下那些东西，勉强糊口度日吧。”
languages.original_text: "Disobeying those in power is apostasy. But depriving a poor person of the little they have is no good deed either. Forgive their insolence, {name}! Let them keep what they have managed to scrape together."

traits.locale_text: “违逆掌权者确实是罪过，但剥夺穷人所剩无几的财产也不是什么善行。请原谅他们的无礼吧，{name}！让他们留下那些东西，勉强糊口度日吧。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Desobedecer a los poderosos es apostasía, pero arrebatar a los pobres lo poco que tienen tampoco es un acto virtuoso. ¡Perdone su insolencia, {name}! Deje que conserven lo que han conseguido rescatar del naufragio».
languages.original_text: "Disobeying those in power is apostasy. But depriving a poor person of the little they have is no good deed either. Forgive their insolence, {name}! Let them keep what they have managed to scrape together."

traits.locale_text: «Desobedecer a los poderosos es un pecado, pero arrebatar a los pobres lo poco que tienen tampoco es un acto virtuoso. ¡Perdone su insolencia, {name}! Deje que conserven lo que han conseguido rescatar del naufragio».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「権力者に従わないのは背教です。しかし、貧しい人からそのわずかな財産を奪うことも善行ではない。彼らの無礼をお許しください、{name}様！あの者たちがかき集めたものを残してやってください」
languages.original_text: "Disobeying those in power is apostasy. But depriving a poor person of the little they have is no good deed either. Forgive their insolence, {name}! Let them keep what they have managed to scrape together."

traits.locale_text: 「権力者に従わないのは背教です。しかし、貧しい人からそのわずかな財産を奪うことも善行ではない。彼らの無礼をお許しください、{name}様！あの者たちがかき集めたものを残してやってください」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Sich den Machthabenden zu widersetzen, ist Apostasie. Doch einem Armen das Wenige zu nehmen, was er besitzt, ist auch keine gute Tat. Verzeiht ihnen die Anmaßung, {name}! Lasst sie behalten, was sie mühsam zusammengekratzt haben."
languages.original_text: "Disobeying those in power is apostasy. But depriving a poor person of the little they have is no good deed either. Forgive their insolence, {name}! Let them keep what they have managed to scrape together."

traits.locale_text: "Ungehorsam gegenüber Machthabenden ist eine Sünde. Aber den Armen das Wenige zu nehmen, was sie haben, ist auch keine gute Tat. Verzeiht die Anmaßung, {name}! Lasst sie behalten, was sie zusammengesammelt haben."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Désobéir au pouvoir en place est une apostasie, mais priver un malheureux du peu qu'il possède n'est pas louable non plus. Pardonnez leur insolence, {name} ! Laissez-les garder le fruit de leur labeur. »
languages.original_text: "Disobeying those in power is apostasy. But depriving a poor person of the little they have is no good deed either. Forgive their insolence, {name}! Let them keep what they have managed to scrape together."

traits.locale_text: « Désobéir au pouvoir en place est un péché, mais priver un malheureux du peu qu'il possède n'est pas louable non plus. Pardonnez leur insolence, {name} ! Laissez-les garder le fruit de leur labeur. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Güç sahiplerine itaat etmemek, dine küfürdür. Ancak fukarayı elindekinden mahrum bırakmakla da sevaba girilmez. Küstahlıklarını mazur gör {name}! Dişlerinden tırnaklarından artırmışlar, bırakalım da onların olsun."
languages.original_text: "Disobeying those in power is apostasy. But depriving a poor person of the little they have is no good deed either. Forgive their insolence, {name}! Let them keep what they have managed to scrape together."
